soap.subjective: Patient reports a sore throat and dry cough for four days, mild fever on the first day around 38 degrees Celsius, no chest pain, and no known allergies or regular medications. Patient's coworker had a cold last week.
soap.objective: Physical exam reveals a red throat and clear lung sounds with normal oxygen levels. No chest pain or breathing difficulties observed.
soap.assessment: Diagnosis of a viral upper respiratory infection. Differential diagnosis includes other viral or bacterial infections of the upper respiratory tract.
soap.plan: Treatment plan includes fluids, rest, and ibuprofen for pain relief. Patient is advised to return for urgent care if symptoms worsen or complications arise. Antibiotics are not indicated at this time.

subjective.sentence: Patient reports a sore throat and dry cough for four days, mild fever on the first day around 38 degrees Celsius, no chest pain, and no known allergies or regular medications.
subjective.quote: "I've had a sore throat and a dry cough for about four days. I had a mild fever on the first day around 38 degrees, but no chest pain. Breathing is fine. No allergies. I'm not on any daily meds. My coworker had a cold last week."

subjective.sentence: Patient's coworker had a cold last week.
subjective.quote: "My coworker had a cold last week."

objective.sentence: Physical exam reveals a red throat and clear lung sounds with normal oxygen levels.
objective.quote: "your throat is a bit red, lungs sounds clear"

objective.sentence: No chest pain or breathing difficulties observed.

assessment.sentence: Diagnosis of a viral upper respiratory infection.
assessment.quote: "This looks like a viral upper respiration infection."

assessment.sentence: Differential diagnosis includes other viral or bacterial infections of the upper respiratory tract.
assessment.quote: "This looks like a viral upper respiration infection."

plan.sentence: Treatment plan includes fluids, rest, and ibuprofen for pain relief.
plan.quote: "I recommend fluids, rest and ibuprofen if you need it."

plan.sentence: Patient is advised to return for urgent care if symptoms worsen or complications arise.
plan.quote: "If you develop high fever, worsening symptoms or breathing trouble, come back and seek urgent care."

plan.sentence: Antibiotics are not indicated at this time.
plan.quote: "Do I need antibiotics? Not right now."
